video_caption: The video features a man wearing a black cap with a white logo, a striped shirt, and a watch on his left wrist, seated at a desk with a microphone in front of him. He is surrounded by various items, including a laptop, a smartphone, and a tablet stand. The background includes a shelf with a plant, a speaker, and a monitor. The man appears to be speaking and gesturing with his hands. The scene transitions to a film set where a group of people is gathered, with one person holding a boom microphone and another operating a camera. The video then returns to the man at the desk, continuing his discussion. A YouTube search results page is shown, displaying various videos related to posting photos on Instagram from a computer. The video concludes with the man still at the desk, continuing his discussion.

The video features a man wearing a black cap with a white logo, a striped shirt, and a visible tattoo on his left arm, sitting at a desk with a microphone in front of him. He is holding a blue smartphone and appears to be recording or streaming, as indicated by the "DU RECORDER" watermark on the screen. The background includes a shelf with various items, a computer monitor, and a laptop on the desk. The man gestures with his left hand while speaking, and the scene transitions to a split-screen view showing the smartphone's home screen on the left, displaying the time as 14:53 and the date as 23 January, with various app icons visible. The right side of the split-screen continues to show the man at the desk. The video then shifts to a series of Instagram posts, starting with an image of a group of people in vintage clothing, followed by a profile page of "bensguides" with 400 posts, 1,168 followers, and 400 following. The profile page includes a description and several images. The video continues to show the Instagram interface, highlighting options such as "Archive," "Insights," "Your activity," "Saved," "Close Friends," and "Discover people." The settings menu is then displayed, showing options like "Creator," "Privacy," "Security," "Ads," "Payments," "Account," "Help," "About," and "Theme." The video concludes with the "Account" settings menu, featuring options like "Saved," "Close friends," "Language," "Captions," "Browser settings," "Contacts syncing," "Sharing to other apps," "Mobile data use," "Original posts," "Request verification," "Posts you've liked," "Branded content tools," and "Switch to business account" or "Switch to personal account." The "DU RECORDER" watermark remains visible throughout the video.

In a cozy, well-lit room, a man wearing a black cap with a white logo and a striped shirt sits at a wooden desk, speaking into a microphone. His tattooed arm rests on the desk, and he gestures expressively as he talks. The background features a white shelf with a plant, a black speaker, and a monitor, all illuminated by soft fairy lights, creating a warm atmosphere. On the desk, a smartphone, a laptop, and a clapperboard with the text "STUDIOS TAKE ROLL SOUND MAN" are visible. As the video progresses, the man continues to speak, occasionally clasping his hands together. Text overlays appear on the screen, including "LIKE THE VIDEO," "SUBSCRIBE," and "GET NOTIFIED," encouraging viewers to engage with the content. The man's gestures and expressions suggest he is passionately discussing a topic, maintaining a consistent and engaging presence throughout the video.

The video begins with a view of a Google homepage, featuring the iconic Google logo and a search bar. Below the search bar, several icons are displayed, including Home, Dashboard, Inbox, and others. The user types "Instagram Creator Studio" into the search bar, and a dropdown list of related search suggestions appears. The user selects "Instagram Creator Studio," leading to a Google search results page that displays various links and information about the topic. The video then transitions to the Facebook Creator Studio interface, showcasing the "Monetisation" and "Brand Collabs Manager" sections. The interface is clean and organized, with a purple header and a white background. The video concludes with a message indicating that Instagram has a new calendar tool, inviting users to try it out. Throughout the video, the environment remains consistent, with a focus on the digital interfaces and the user's interaction with them.

The video showcases a user navigating through the Facebook Creator Studio interface, specifically focusing on the Instagram account management section. Initially, the user is seen browsing the "Content library" where various posts are listed, including a published post with 135 likes and 3 comments. The user then transitions to the "Insights" section, exploring the "Activity" tab which displays interactions and actions taken on the account. Following this, the user examines the "Audience" tab, revealing detailed statistics such as the total number of followers (1.2K) and a breakdown of the age and gender demographics of the followers, with 64% male and 44% female. The user then moves to the "Instagram accounts" section, where the account "Ben Taylor | Photographer" is listed with 1,188 followers. The user explores the account's settings, including options for Ads Manager, Events, Instant Articles, and Shop. The video concludes with the user still in the "Instagram accounts" section, highlighting the account's follower count and the available settings. Throughout the video, the interface maintains a consistent purple and white color scheme, with a sidebar on the left providing navigation options such as "Content library," "Calendar," "Insights," "Monetization," "Instagram accounts," and "Resources."

The video showcases a user interface of Facebook's Creator Studio, specifically focusing on the process of posting content to an Instagram account. The interface is divided into two main sections: the left sidebar with options like 'Content Library,' 'Calendar,' 'Insights,' 'Automation,' 'Instagram accounts,' and 'Resources,' and the right section where the user is composing a post for 'Ben Taylor | Photographer.' The user begins by typing a caption, adding emojis, and selecting a video thumbnail from a library. The video thumbnail features a person walking in a snowy forest. The user then proceeds to add a location and tags to the post. The interface provides options for advanced settings and publishing the post. The video concludes with a prompt to press 'Publish' to post the content on Instagram, accompanied by a visual cue indicating the action. The overall atmosphere is instructional, guiding the user through the steps of creating and publishing a post on Instagram via Facebook's Creator Studio.

The video begins with a screenshot of a Facebook Creator Studio interface, showcasing the 'Instagram accounts' section. The interface displays a post titled 'Post to Instagram feed' by 'Ben Taylor | Photographer,' featuring a video thumbnail of a person walking in a snowy forest. The post includes options to 'Add information,' 'Select cover thumbnail,' and 'Advanced settings,' with a 'Publish' button at the bottom. The scene transitions to a different interface, 'Lately Social,' where a user is creating a new Instagram post. The post is scheduled for '14/2/2020' at '03:36 AM,' tagged with 'Trip' and '#landscape,' and includes a preview image of a scenic castle pathway. The user selects 'Enter location' and 'Add a first comment on your post.' The video then shifts to a person sitting at a desk, wearing a black cap with a white logo, a striped shirt, and a watch, speaking into a microphone. The desk is equipped with a laptop, a tablet, and a clapperboard labeled 'STUDIOS,' 'TAKE,' 'ROLL,' 'SQUAD,' and 'DIRECTOR.' The background features a shelf with a plant, a speaker, and a monitor, creating a cozy, well-lit atmosphere. The person gestures with their hands while speaking, indicating an engaging presentation or discussion. The video continues with the same individual at the desk, maintaining the same attire and setting, with the addition of a laptop and a tablet on the desk. The person continues to speak into the microphone, using hand gestures to emphasize their points, suggesting a continuous and focused discussion or presentation.

In a cozy, well-lit room, a man wearing a black cap with a white logo and a striped shirt sits at a desk, speaking into a microphone. His left arm is tattooed, and he gestures expressively with his hands as he talks. The desk is equipped with a laptop, a tablet in a stand, and a clapperboard with the text "STUDIOS TAKE ROLL SOUND MAN" visible. Behind him, a shelf holds a potted plant and a speaker, while a monitor and fairy lights add to the ambiance. The man's animated gestures and the warm lighting create an engaging and inviting atmosphere.
